_header: Also the lantern in the wind that soon is I-queint
_description: The transitoriness of life (perhaps by William Herebert) — two couplets

BLAdd46919.Transcription:
Also þe lanterne in þe wynd þat sone is
                    aqueynt…
BLAdd46919.Editions:
Wright,  Thomas,  and  James Orchard Halliwell-Phillipps, eds.  
             Reliquiae Antiquae.
         2 vols. London: Smith, 1845: 2.229.
Reimer,  Stephen R. 
             The Works of William Herebert, OFM.
         Toronto: Pontifical Institute of Mediaeval Studies, 1987: 137.
